additional_requirement: Discuss ethical dilemmas and potential for abuse in authoritarian regimes
Focus on the legal and moral boundaries of ethical hacking
Explore potential risks and incidents from past unregulated AI experiments
Analyze the impact on democratic processes and election outcomes
Discuss controversies and biases in algorithms used for predictive policing
Include case studies where deepfakes have been used to manipulate political scenarios
Discuss ethical concerns and the debate over human control
Explore significant cases where user privacy was compromised
Discuss safety and regulatory challenges faced by gig economy workers
Focus on workplace safety violations and environmental impacts
